newsitem.title: USA: Montgomery adds to high yield bond sector.
newsitem.headline: Montgomery adds to high yield bond sector.

text.p: Montgomery Securities on Wednesday said it hired Robert Heffes and Trish Parisi from Salomon Brothers Inc as the latest additions to its new high-yield bond department.
Heffes, formerly a senior trader has been hired as a principal in the high yield trading department. Parisi, formerly a senior high-yield sales person, was hired as a principal in high-yield sales.
Both started at Montgomery on February 18.
Heffes will report to Peter Wilson, head of high-yield trading. Wilson joined Montgomery last month from Bear Stearns Cos Inc.
Parisi will report to Ashley Coooper, head of high-yield sales at Montgomery. Cooper joined the firm several weeks ago from Lehman Brothers Inc.
Other recent additions to Montgomery's high-yield team include Rob Long and Lee Stern, formerly of Nomura Securities Inc .
Montgomery says it is expanding its high-yield department in order to complement its already strong equity finance business.
